topic.title: Card property values page
topic.warning: Card property values determine how Mingle manages project workflow. Adding or changing property values may have a major impact on the project team. Ensure you understand the details in card properties before changing values on this page.

section.title: What you can do on this page

topic.section:
The Card property values page lets you add, edit or delete the values available for managed list card properties, and shows how many cards share the value. From here you can change the colors assigned to values and re-order the list of values by dragging and dropping. The order of the property values determines how cards display when Sorting in the Grid view.
You can also use the Edit property link to modify the card property itself.
